txt.en: You have been tasked with defending Erebor from a Frost-horde assault.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'We have just received a missive from Erebor. They are under siege by a horde of frost-drakes! We must depart for Erebor immediately and assist the Longbeards in thwarting this assault!'
'The Lonely Mountain of Erebor, a stronghold of the North, must be defended at all costs.\n\n'Your mission is to defend Erebor from a Frost-horde assault.'
Drakes in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to defend Erebor from a Frost-horde assault.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel.
'Well done! With the drake assault defeated, Erebor is once again safe! The last thing we need is the greatest dwarf stronghold of the north in ruins!'
